BattleEffectText.Name: Yellow Spark
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the end of the Scene, take {0} stagger damage, then reduce the stack by a third

BattleEffectText.Name: Blue Flame
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the end of the Scene, take 3*{0} damage, then remove the entire stack

BattleEffectText.Name: Absorbtion
BattleEffectText.Desc: Passive Effect "Built Strength" maximum value is increased by {0}

BattleEffectText.Name: Penumbric
BattleEffectText.Desc: When recieving damage, reflect {0} damage back to the attacker

BattleEffectText.Name: Umbral Lens
BattleEffectText.Desc: If this character takes no action, receive {0} damage

BattleEffectText.Name: Crimson Dust
BattleEffectText.Desc: When triggered by a Burst effect, dispel all statuses and inflict damage equal to {0} times the amount of statuses removed. This status is ignored by passives 'Red Sky' and 'Clarity'.

BattleEffectText.Name: New Moon
BattleEffectText.Desc: Increase Attack Dice power by 1

BattleEffectText.Name: Crescent Moon
BattleEffectText.Desc: Increase Attack Dice power by 2 and Damage by 10%

BattleEffectText.Name: Half Moon
BattleEffectText.Desc: Increase all Dice power by 3 and Damage by 20%

BattleEffectText.Name: Gibbous Moon
BattleEffectText.Desc: Increase all Dice power by 5 and gain Ecliptic

BattleEffectText.Name: Full Moon
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain Lunacy and Ecliptic

BattleEffectText.Name: Lunacy
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain a percent change to triple dice rolls based on missing stagger resist ({0}% chance)

BattleEffectText.Name: Ecliptic
BattleEffectText.Desc: Deal damage based on missing stagger resist ({0}% boost)

BattleEffectText.Name: Lynn's Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Lynn's Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Fel's Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Fel's Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Akao's Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Akao's Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Enbana's Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Enbana's Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Saeka's Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Saeka's Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Gredo's Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Gredo's Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Rube's Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Rube's Key page.

BattleEffectText.Name: Citri's Exclusive Page
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can only be set in the deck of Citri's Key page.
